alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 13 at 9:47AM CDT until April 13 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 133 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA COFFEE DALE GENEVA HENRY HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA COLQUITT THOMAS IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER DECATUR EARLY GRADY MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ABBEVILLE MUNICIPAL A/P, ALMA, APALACHICOLA, ASBURY, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BATTENS CROSSROADS, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BEAMON, BELLVIEW, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLACKWELL FIELD A/P, BLACKWOOD, BLAKELY, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BROWNS CROSSROADS, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CENTERVILLE, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, COLQUITT, COOKTOWN, COTTON, COTTONWOOD, CUBA, DALEVILLE, DAVIS PARK, DECATUR CO A/P, DILL, DILLON, DILLS, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, DRIFTON, EARLY CO A/P, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, ENTERPRISE, ENTERPRISE, ENTERPRISE MUNICIPAL A/P, EWELL, FADETTE, FAIRCHILD, FESTUS, FORT GADSDEN, FORT RUCKER, GANER, GENEVA, GENEVA MUNICIPAL A/P, GRADY CO A/P, HACODA, HANOVER, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HARTFORD, HAWKINSTOWN, HEADLAND, HEADLAND MUNICIPAL A/P, HILLIARDVILLE, HOGGARD MILL, IVEYS MILL, JARROTT, KEYTON, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LAWRENCEVILLE, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOGAN FIELD MUNICIPAL A/P, LYNN, MABSON, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NEWTON, OZARK, PASCO, PELHAM, PINE PARK, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SCREAMER, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SOPCHOPPY, SPENCE AIRPORT, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, THOMASVILLE, TILTON, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WEST BAINBRIDGE, AND WETUMPKA.
